description: Technical indicators to run technical analysis with JavaScript / TypeScript.
name: trading-signals

scripts.changelog:commit: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "docs: updated CHANGELOG.md"
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.docs: npm run dist && cd docs && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.fix: npm run fix:other && npm run fix:code
scripts.lint: npm run lint:types && npm run lint:code && npm run lint:other
scripts.postversion: git push origin && git push origin --tags && npm publish && git restore .
scripts.preversion: git checkout main && git pull && npm install && npm run test && npm run dist && npm run test:exports
scripts.release:major: generate-changelog -M -x "chore,test" && npm run changelog:commit && npm version major
scripts.release:minor: generate-changelog -m -x "chore,test" && npm run changelog:commit && npm version minor
scripts.release:patch: generate-changelog -p -x "chore,test" && npm run changelog:commit && npm version patch
scripts.test: npm run test:types && npm run test:imports && npm run test:units -- --coverage
